# Grolantor
## Overview
Name: Grolantor

Gender: m

Rank: Intermediate Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Hill Giants, Ettins, Ogres, Hunting, Combat

Titles:

Holy Symbol: Spiked club

Alignment: CE

Origin of Worship: Giant

Core Worshippers: Hill Giants and Ettins and Ogres

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Club

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: +1 mighty cleaving club

Domains: Chaos, Competition\* (CD), Death, Earth, Evil, Madness\* (CD), Mysticism\* (CD).
